name: WorkdaysUntil
0:
”Alexa, start Workdays Until”
”Alexa, ask workdays until how many workdays are left until Christmas”
”Alexa, ask workdays until how many workdays are left until New Year's”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: workdays until
des:
Working too hard and can't wait until your next holiday vacation? Planning a long Christmas vacation and keep counting the days you have to work until then?
Workdays Until counts for you the number of workdays until that holiday.
The count excludes Saturday, Sunday and the federal US holidays.
